rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {IAR2116, OHS1000}
Must be enrolled in course version {2126%, 2136%, F3001%}

description: This unit builds on skills developed in previous studios and applies these to a range of focused projects that extend and explore transformational practices in interior architecture. In this studio successful project outcomes will be of an intermediate level of complexity. They will provide an opportunity to integrate learning across the course with the development of responsive design practices.  A number of focused studio projects will be offered.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
